title: Music4MyEyes
subtitle: 3D Music Player and Visualizer
body:
Music4MyEyes is a interactive music visualizer which displays different shapes, colors, and animations depending on the frequency and amplitude of the music. Users can choose from 12 different visulizations. For instance, one visualization resembles mountains with different colors for elevation such as blue for the lower one, yellow for the middle, and red for the top. Another vizualization looks like a pool of water with drops of water that jump out of the water at the rithm of the music.

The vizualizer has versatile controls. It allows the user to rotate, move and zoom in and out.

Music4MyEyes comes preloaded with music from OsoX, but users can also load their own music. In this way the app works also works as a music player. The preloaded songs were carfully selected to complement the style of the respective vizualization. The music player has seven different buckets where users are able to load music tracks. Then the user is able to select each track and play, pause, forward, or rewind.
